title: Remove Certifications & Partnerships section entirely

requirements.text: Remove the Certifications & Partnerships section from the page entirely. This includes removing the section heading, any placeholder text, and the Certifications component from App.tsx. Also remove any navigation link to the certifications/partnerships section from the Header.

quotes: Remove certification and partner column details

acceptanceCriteria: The Certifications component is no longer rendered in App.tsx
No 'Certifications & Partnerships' section heading or content appears on the page
The Header navigation does not contain a link to the certifications section
The rest of the page layout (Header, Hero, Services, Products, AMC, Footer) remains intact and unaffected

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Do not alter the Footer, Services, Products, AMC, Hero, or Header components beyond removing any certifications-related nav link
nonGoals: Redesigning or replacing the certifications section with new content
Adding any new sections or features
